    new() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/test/unit/testcase.rb, line 855
def initialize
  @start_time = nil
  @elapsed_time = nil
  @passed = true
  @interrupted = false
  @test_data_label = nil
  @test_data = nil
end

    assign_test_data(label, data) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/test/unit/testcase.rb, line 872
def assign_test_data(label, data)
  @test_data_label = label
  @test_data = data
end

    # File lib/test/unit/testcase.rb, line 877
def have_test_data?
  not @test_data_label.nil?
end

def problem_occurred

end
    test_finished() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/test/unit/testcase.rb, line 885
def test_finished
  @elapsed_time = Time.now - @start_time
end
